description: Sample conversation for testing RSVP tracking
scenario: School parent coordinator requesting RSVPs for various events

messages.content: Hi parents! We need RSVPs for the Fall Field Trip to the Science Museum on Friday, November 10th. Please respond by Monday, November 6th so we can arrange transportation.
Yes, my daughter Emma will be attending!
Thanks Jennifer! Still waiting to hear from: Mike, Sarah, Lisa, and Tom.
Also, quick reminder - we need volunteers for the Halloween Party on October 31st. Can anyone help from 2-4 PM? Please let me know by tomorrow.
I can help with the Halloween party!
Perfect Sarah! One more thing - parent-teacher conference signups are open. Please schedule your 15-minute slot by end of this week. Link in the school portal.

expectedRSVPs.eventName: Fall Field Trip to Science Museum
